page.title: 09Summary
page.content: {Everybody}we talked to said they {liked living in the area. Most people get around by{car, {public transport}is not very good. Every house had{electricity,}mains {water}and some from of heating. {Heating}is by coal,oil or gas fired boilers or open fires. The gas is either mains,in Acle, or Propane (Liquid Petroleum Gas) in North Burlingham and some farms.Most people have a{telephone.}The groups of buildings in Acle and one group in North Burlingham have mains{drainage, the rest have septic tanks.
